name: SCP: Containment Breach - Unity Remake
description: Allows you to install a manual copy of the game. Requires Windows ZIP.

files.zip: N/A:Please select the unextracted zip file with the game.

content:
files:
- zip: N/A:Please select the unextracted zip file with the game.
game:
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/SCP Containment Breach/Containment Breach.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/SCP Containment Breach
    src: zip
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
